metadata.description: From the pages of INVINCIBLE!  You know her, you love her, it’s the girl after Invincible’s heart: ATOM EVE!  Find out how she got her powers, and what shaped her into the woman she is today.  Robert Kirkman presents a tale of tragedy and triumph that will have lasting effects on the INVINCIBLE series.
metadata.name: Invincible Presents: Atom Eve, Vol. 1
